00036 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00038 #define BUFFER_SIZE                             0x400
00039 
00043 #define I2S_BUFFER_SRC                  LPC_AHBRAM1_BASE //0x20080000
00044 
00048 #define I2S_BUFFER_DST                  (I2S_BUFFER_SRC+0x1000UL) //0x20081000
00049 
00050 #define RXFIFO_EMPTY            0
00051 #define TXFIFO_FULL                     8
00052 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES ***********************/
00053 uint8_t menu[]=
00054         "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00055         "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00056         " I2S MCLK demo \n\r"
00057         "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00058         "\t - Core: ARM CORTEX-M3 \n\r"
00059         "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00060         " This example describes how to use I2S master clock as I2S clock source\n\r"
00061         "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00062 
00063 volatile uint8_t  I2STXDone = 0;
00064 volatile uint8_t  I2SRXDone = 0;
00065 
00066 volatile uint32_t *I2STXBuffer = (uint32_t*)(I2S_BUFFER_SRC);
00067 volatile uint32_t *I2SRXBuffer = (uint32_t *)(I2S_BUFFER_DST);
00068 
00069 volatile uint32_t I2SReadLength = 0;
00070 volatile uint32_t I2SWriteLength = 0;

00073 uint8_t rx_depth_irq = 0;
00074 uint8_t dummy=0;

00084 /*----------------- INTERRUPT SERVICE ROUTINES --------------------------*/
00085 /*********************************************************************/
00090 void I2S_IRQHandler()
00091 {
00092         uint32_t RXLevel = 0;
00093 
00094         //Check RX interrupt
00095         if(I2S_GetIRQStatus(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE))
00096         {
00097                 RXLevel = I2S_GetLevel(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE);
00098                 if ( (RXLevel != RXFIFO_EMPTY) && !I2SRXDone )
00099                 {
00100                         while ( RXLevel > 0 )
00101                         {
00102                                 if ( I2SReadLength == BUFFER_SIZE )
00103                                 {
00104                                         //Stop RX
00105                                         I2S_Stop(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE);
00106                                         // Disable RX
00107                                         I2S_IRQCmd(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE, DISABLE);
00108                                         I2SRXDone = 1;
00109                                         break;
00110                                 }
00111                                 else
00112                                 {
00113                                         I2SRXBuffer[I2SReadLength++] = LPC_I2S->I2SRXFIFO;
00114                                 }
00115                                 RXLevel--;
00116                         }
00117                 }
00118         }
00119         return;
00120 }
00121 
00122 /*-------------------------PRIVATE FUNCTIONS------------------------------*/
00123 /*********************************************************************/
00128 void Buffer_Init(void) {
00129         uint32_t i;
00130         for ( i = 0; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++ )     /* clear buffer */
00131         {
00132         I2STXBuffer[i] = i;
00133         I2SRXBuffer[i] = 0;
00134         }
00135 
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*********************************************************************/
00144 Bool Buffer_Verify(void) {
00145         uint32_t i;
00146         uint32_t *pTX = (uint32_t *) &I2STXBuffer[0];
00147         uint32_t *pRX = (uint32_t *) &I2SRXBuffer[1];
00148         /* Because first element of RX is dummy 0 value, so we just verify
00149          * from 2nd element
00150          */
00151         for (i = 1; i < BUFFER_SIZE; i++) {
00152                 if (*pTX++ != *pRX++)  {
00153                         return FALSE;
00154                 }
00155         }
00156         return TRUE;
00157 }
00158 /*********************************************************************/
00163 void print_menu(void)
00164 {
00165         _DBG_(menu);
00166 }

00169 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00170 /*********************************************************************/
00175 int c_entry (void) {                       /* Main Program */
00176         I2S_MODEConf_Type I2S_ClkConfig;
00177         I2S_CFG_Type I2S_ConfigStruct;
00178         PINSEL_CFG_Type PinCfg;
00179 
00180         uint32_t i;
00181         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00182          * – 115200bps
00183          * – 8 data bit
00184          * – No parity
00185          * – 1 stop bit
00186          * – No flow control
00187          */
00188         debug_frmwrk_init();
00189 
00190         //print menu screen
00191         print_menu();
00192 /* Initialize I2S peripheral ------------------------------------*/
00193         /* Pin configuration:
00194          * Assign:      - P0.4 as I2SRX_CLK
00195          *                      - P0.5 as I2SRX_WS
00196          *                      - P0.6 as I2SRX_SDA
00197          *                      - P0.7 as I2STX_CLK
00198          *                      - P0.8 as I2STX_WS
00199          *                      - P0.9 as I2STX_SDA
00200          */
00201         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00202         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00203         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00204         PinCfg.Pinnum = 4;
00205         PinCfg.Portnum = 0;
00206         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00207         PinCfg.Pinnum = 5;
00208         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00209         PinCfg.Pinnum = 6;
00210         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00211         PinCfg.Pinnum = 7;
00212         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00213         PinCfg.Pinnum = 8;
00214         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00215         PinCfg.Pinnum = 9;
00216         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00217 
00218         /* P4.29 as TX_MCLK */
00219         PinCfg.Funcnum = 1;
00220         PinCfg.OpenDrain = 0;
00221         PinCfg.Pinmode = 0;
00222         PinCfg.Pinnum = 29;
00223         PinCfg.Portnum = 4;
00224         PINSEL_ConfigPin(&PinCfg);
00225 
00226         Buffer_Init();
00227 
00228         I2S_Init(LPC_I2S);
00229 
00230         /* setup:
00231          *              - wordwidth: 16 bits
00232          *              - stereo mode
00233          *              - master mode for I2S_TX and slave for I2S_RX
00234          *              - ws_halfperiod is 31
00235          *              - not use mute mode
00236          *              - use reset and stop mode
00237          *              - select the fractional rate divider clock output as the source,
00238          *              - disable 4-pin mode
00239          *              - MCLK ouput is disable
00240          *              - Frequency = 44.1 kHz
00241          * Because we use mode I2STXMODE[3:0]= 0000, I2SDAO[5]=0 and
00242          * I2SRX[3:0]=0000, I2SDAI[5] = 1. So we have I2SRX_CLK = I2STX_CLK
00243          * --> I2SRXBITRATE = 1 (not divide TXCLK to produce RXCLK)
00244          */
00245 
00246         /* Audio Config*/
00247         I2S_ConfigStruct.wordwidth = I2S_WORDWIDTH_16;
00248         I2S_ConfigStruct.mono = I2S_STEREO;
00249         I2S_ConfigStruct.stop = I2S_STOP_ENABLE;
00250         I2S_ConfigStruct.reset = I2S_RESET_ENABLE;
00251         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_MASTER_MODE;
00252         I2S_ConfigStruct.mute = I2S_MUTE_DISABLE;
00253         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00254 
00255         I2S_ConfigStruct.ws_sel = I2S_SLAVE_MODE;
00256         I2S_Config(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,&I2S_ConfigStruct);
00257 
00258         I2S_Stop(LPC_I2S, I2S_TX_MODE);
00259         I2S_Stop(LPC_I2S, I2S_RX_MODE);
00260 
00261         /* Clock Mode Config
00262          * I2S transmitter:
00263          *      - Select TX fractional rate divider clock ouput as the source
00264          *  - Disable 4-wire mode
00265          *  - Enable for the TX_MCLK output (optional, this setting just for
00266          *  user can observe master clock on oscilloscope)
00267          * I2S receiver:
00268          *      - Select TX_MCLK signal as the RX_MCLK clock source
00269          *  - Disable 4-wire mode
00270          *  - Disable for the RX_MCLK output
00271          */
00272         I2S_ClkConfig.clksel = I2S_CLKSEL_FRDCLK;
00273         I2S_ClkConfig.fpin = I2S_4PIN_DISABLE;
00274         I2S_ClkConfig.mcena = I2S_MCLK_ENABLE;
00275         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_TX_MODE);
00276 
00277         I2S_ClkConfig.clksel = I2S_CLKSEL_MCLK;
00278         I2S_ClkConfig.mcena = I2S_MCLK_DISABLE;
00279         I2S_ModeConfig(LPC_I2S,&I2S_ClkConfig,I2S_RX_MODE);
00280 
00281         I2S_FreqConfig(LPC_I2S, 44100, I2S_TX_MODE);
00282         I2S_FreqConfig(LPC_I2S, 44100, I2S_RX_MODE);
00283 
00284         NVIC_EnableIRQ(I2S_IRQn);
00285 
00286         /* RX FIFO depth is 1, TX FIFO depth is 8. */
00287         I2S_IRQConfig(LPC_I2S,I2S_TX_MODE,8);
00288         I2S_IRQConfig(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,1);
00289         I2S_IRQCmd(LPC_I2S,I2S_RX_MODE,ENABLE);
00290         I2S_Start(LPC_I2S);
00291 
00292 /* I2S transmit ---------------------------------------------------*/
00293         while ( I2SWriteLength < BUFFER_SIZE )
00294         {
00295                 while(I2S_GetLevel(LPC_I2S, I2S_TX_MODE)==TXFIFO_FULL);
00296                 I2S_Send(LPC_I2S, I2STXBuffer[I2SWriteLength++]);
00297         }
00298 
00299         I2STXDone = 1;
00300 
00301         /* Wait for transmit/receive complete */
00302         while ( !I2SRXDone || !I2STXDone );
00303         for(i=0;i<BUFFER_SIZE;i++)
00304         {
00305                 _DBH32(I2SRXBuffer[i]);_DBG_("");
00306         }
00307         /* Verify RX and TX Buffer */
00308         if(Buffer_Verify())
00309         {
00310                 _DBG_("Verify Buffer: OK...");
00311         }
00312         else
00313         {
00314                 _DBG_("Verify Buffer: ERROR...");
00315         }
00316         while(1);
00317 }
00318 
00319 /* With ARM and GHS toolsets, the entry point is main() - this will
00320    allow the linker to generate wrapper code to setup stacks, allocate
00321    heap area, and initialize and copy code and data segments. For GNU
00322    toolsets, the entry point is through __start() in the crt0_gnu.asm
00323    file, and that startup code will setup stacks and data */
00324 int main(void)
00325 {
00326     return c_entry();
00327 }

00335 * @return               None
00336 *******************************************************************************/
00337 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
00338 {
00339         /* User can add his own implementation to report the file name and line number,
00340          ex: printf("Wrong parameters value: file %s on line %d\r\n", file, line) */
00341 
00342         /* Infinite loop */
00343         while(1);
00344 }
